objects.name: Analytic 1243
objects.description: Monitor kernel module load/unload activity via modprobe, insmod, rmmod, or direct manipulation of /lib/modules. Correlate with installation of kernel headers, compilation commands, or downloads of .ko files. Detect anomalies in unsigned module loading or repeated module load attempts under non-root users.
